{{title|deduction guides for {{tt|std::pair}}}}
{{cpp/utility/pair/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|utility}}
{{dcl | since=c++17 |
template&lt;class T1, class T2&gt;
pair(T1, T2) -&gt; pair&lt;T1, T2&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

One [[cpp/language/class template argument deduction|deduction guide]] is provided for {{lc|std::pair}} to account for the edge cases missed by the implicit deduction guides, in particular, non-copyable arguments and array to pointer conversion.
 
===Example===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;utility&gt;

int main()
{
    int a[2], b[3];
    std::pair p{a, b}; // explicit deduction guide is used in this case
}
}}
